mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grade(grade_id, grade_t_id, grade_stu_id, grade, grade_subject, grade_stu_name, grade_t_name) VALUES(#{gradeId}, #{gradeTId}, #{gradeStuId}, #{grade}, #{gradeSubject}, #{gradeStuName}, #{gradeTName})
mapper.select: SELECT grade_id, grade_t_id, grade_stu_id, grade, grade_subject, grade_stu_name, grade_t_name FROM grade WHERE grade_stu_id = #{value}

SELECT a.account_id, a.role_id, a.account_name, a.account_address, a.account_class_id, a.account_password, a.account_phone, a.account_sex, a.t_subject, a.par_id, g.grade_id, g.grade_t_id, g.grade_stu_id, g.grade, g.grade_subject, g.grade_stu_name, g.grade_t_name FROM account a INNER JOIN grade g ON a.account_id = g.grade_stu_id
